title: Finch Staff
info: The Finch Staff is an aerial melee summon weapon which summons a Baby Finch as a minion. Like other minions, the summoned Baby Finch is invincible and follows the player for an unlimited amount of time, unless the player dies, summons a replacement minion, or cancels the buff. The Finch Staff is the most basic summon weapon in the game. It is automatically equipped for Journey Mode characters, and can be found in Living Wood Chests within Living Trees in all modes.
